summary: drm/meson: encoder_cvbs: Fix refcount leak in meson_encoder_cvbs_init
details:
drm/meson: encoder_cvbs: Fix refcount leak in meson_encoder_cvbs_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit bb5ac08d5bd8626c318bd80a5063263daab8fdb6, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 318ba02cd8a8bacd20a4fe29edff3c0931d17ded. For more details please see the references link.
